channel.title: ReflectScape 639 | 24/7 Online | NEW SERVER | UPDATED
channel.description:
[url=http://reflectscape.com/]http://reflectscape.com/[/url]
Looking for a brand new server to play on?! If you answered that question with a "yes", come and take a look at ReflectScape!
[B]Some of our servers' features:[/B] - Dementhium based. - Running on VPS (24/7 online) - 20+ fully working bosses. - 15+ Training spots. - All working specs. - Well balanced exp rate. - Fully automated Donation system. - Automated vote system with rewards. - Working duel arena. - Working barrows. - All skills trainable. - Working summoning. - Shops south of home. - Teleporter at home who can take you anywhere you need. - Active community. - Much more!
[B]What are we looking for?[/B] We are currently looking for active players, who enjoy the good old 2011 RSPS. :)
[B]Download our client on our website:[/B] [url=http://reflectscape.com/]http://reflectscape.com/[/url]
[img]http://i57.tinypic.com/ege07q.jpg[/img] [img]http://i62.tinypic.com/wjc594.jpg[/img] [img]http://i59.tinypic.com/33ma4iv.jpg[/img] [img]http://i58.tinypic.com/nq1e8z.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/65ogon.png[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2ptntxu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/eitjkh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/24cwjyw.png[/img] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2w4i5ns.png[/img]
[url=http://reflectscape.com/]http://reflectscape.com/[/url]

item.title: ReflectScape 639 | 24/7 Online | NEW SERVER | UPDATED
item.dc:creator: @fatkidslag fatkidslag
item.description:
@fatkidslag wrote:

[quote=“wimstr, post:4, topic:550715”]Decided to try the server out.

You should really make a small tutorial, like how to go to areas etc.
I bought a Camelot teletab to get to Rcokcrabs, but my client crashed on the way there.
Then i found out this random dude at home teleports you around.

Then when i teleported to the Rock Crab cave, my client frozen twice.
Not even considering the weird interface you used when being teleported.
You definetly got some work left to do.

EDIT: This client is seriously full of flaws, it keeps freezing.[/quote]
It’s just you. And yes, his cache doesnt contain full mapdata.

Read full topic

item.title: ReflectScape 639 | 24/7 Online | NEW SERVER | UPDATED
item.dc:creator: @wimstr wimstr
item.description:
@wimstr wrote:

Decided to try the server out.

You should really make a small tutorial, like how to go to areas etc.
I bought a Camelot teletab to get to Rcokcrabs, but my client crashed on the way there.
Then i found out this random dude at home teleports you around.

Then when i teleported to the Rock Crab cave, my client frozen twice.
Not even considering the weird interface you used when being teleported.
You definetly got some work left to do.

EDIT: This client is seriously full of flaws, it keeps freezing.
